Timer Address



#define TIMER_0   0x40
 Adress of Timer0 divider.
#define TIMER_1   0x41
 Adress of Timer1 divider.
#define TIMER_2   0x42
 Adress of Timer2 divider.
#define TIMER_CTRL   0x43
 The address of the timer control register.

Speaker and Timer2 control and bit meanings



#define SPEAKER_CTRL   0x61
 The address of a generic PC register, whose bits 0 and 1 control the timer2 clock and output to the speaker.
#define TIMER2_ENABLE   (1 << 0)
 Enable Timer 2 clock.
#define SPEAKER_ENABLE   (1 << 1)
 Enable Timer 2 output to speaker.

Some usefull (and nice) definitions



#define TIMER_CLK   1193181
 The timers input frequency.
#define LCOM_MODE   0x36
 Control byte: LSB followed by MSB, mode 3, binary count.
#define LSB(i)   ((i) & 0xFF)
 The Least Significative Byte of a Word.
#define MSB(i)   ((i) >> 8)
 The Most Significative Byte of a Word.

Detailed Description

Timer-Counter definitions

Define Documentation

#define LCOM_MODE   0x36

Control byte: LSB followed by MSB, mode 3, binary count.

#define LSB ( i   )     ((i) & 0xFF)

The Least Significative Byte of a Word.

#define MSB ( i   )     ((i) >> 8)

The Most Significative Byte of a Word.

#define SPEAKER_CTRL   0x61

The address of a generic PC register, whose bits 0 and 1 control the timer2 clock and output to the speaker.

#define SPEAKER_ENABLE   (1 << 1)

Enable Timer 2 output to speaker.

#define TIMER2_ENABLE   (1 << 0)

Enable Timer 2 clock.

#define TIMER_0   0x40

Adress of Timer0 divider.

#define TIMER_1   0x41

Adress of Timer1 divider.

#define TIMER_2   0x42

Adress of Timer2 divider.

#define TIMER_CLK   1193181

The timers input frequency.

#define TIMER_CTRL   0x43

The address of the timer control register.

void mili_sleep ( int  mili  ) 

Wait mili miliseconds, indirectly counting T0 interrupts

wait secs seconds, indirectly counting T0 interrupts
